abstract: Shareholders of the retail giant Target delivered a stinging defeat to the activist investor William A. Ackman on Thursday, re-electing all of the company’s nominees to the board in one of the most closely watched proxy contests of the season.
snippet: Shareholders of the retail giant Target delivered a stinging defeat to the activist investor William A. Ackman on Thursday, re-electing all of the company’s nominees to the board in one of the most closely watched proxy contests of the season.
lead_paragraph: Update | 3:39 p.m. Shareholders of the retail giant Target delivered a stinging defeat to the activist investor William A. Ackman on Thursday, re-electing all of the company’s nominees to the board in one of the most closely watched proxy contests of the season.
